content: catch cc floats as needed of row round 2 sm k1 sm follow chart until the end of the round row 3 k1 m1r k to marker m1l sm follow chart until 1 round 3 sm m1r k to 2nd marker m1l sm follow chart stitch remaining k1 mc until the end of the round row 4 p1 mc follow chart until marker sm p to end of round 4 sm k to 2nd marker sm follow chart until the row end of the round repeat row 3 and 4 until 12 14 16 sts between marker repeat rounds 3 and 4 until 11 13 15 sts between ending on a ws row markers on the next round place stitches between on next rs row k1 m1r k1 m1r k to one stitch before markers onto a piece of scrap yarn continue to follow the the marker m1l k1 remove marker place these 15 17 chart 19 sts on a piece of scrap yarn m1l continue following the chart for the rest of the row k1 mc f =mc =cc e when working in the round knit all stitches reading chart from right to left each round d when working flat knit right side row a c and e c reading chart from right to left purl wrong side row b d and f reading chart from left to right b a hand continue following the chart for mittens worked flat begin and end each row with a mc stitch until mitten reaches 3 75 6 7 from the end of the corrugated ribbing or about 3/4 below the tip of your longest finger ending with either round/row b or e of the chart the round/row that you ended on will determine which set of instructions you will use for the decrease decrease after round/row b flat in the round row 1 rs k1 *k2tog k2* repeat until last stitch k1 round 1 *k2tog k2* repeat to end of round row 2 ws p1 mc *p1 cc p2 mc* repeat until last stitch round 2 *k2 mc k1 cc* repeat to end of round p1 mc note cc will not be used again after this round note cc will not be used again after this row round 3 k all stitches row 3 k all stitches round 4 *k2tog k1* repeat to end of round row 4 p1 *p1 p2tog* until last stitch p1 round 5 k all stitches row 5 k all stitches round 6 k2tog until end of round row 6 p2tog until the end of the row cut yarn leaving a tail pull tail through remaining stitches cut yarn leaving a long tail pull tail through remaining tighten and secure stitches tighten and secure the tail will be used to stitch the seam so be sure it is plenty long decrease after round/row e in the round flat round 1 *k2 k2tog* repeat to end of round row 1 ws p1 *p2tog p2* repeat until last stitch
